Version 1.2.10b1

Version 1.2.10b2

- Mostly all buttons at main screen and results screen prepared to multifunction (single, double, long taps).
Nedd testing.
- Some fixes in power adapter show when attached.

Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Open N-th home folder with configuration for 'Home' button - as part
of preparation for 'multifunction' buttons (with some additional
sub-parameters in settings, for 'Start spplication...')


Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.2.10b3
- force screen orientation change (configurable).
- some changes in Home button configuration (fixed).
- simplify buttons on Preferences screen.
- simplify buttons on Search screen.

Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.2.10b4
- Home button configuration - fixes.
- Lock functionality in Advanced screen (need root rights).


Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.2.10b5
- full new icons and some layout changes (NOOK look and feel)
- some changes in on-screen scroll buttons (for Sony users satisfaction)

Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

- Fixed size of Advanced screen buttons
- Added Advanced screen button 'Setup WiFi' (quick jump to appropriate Settings tab), icon will be soon
- Added check of rooting in Lock,Reboot,PowerOff buttons


Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.3.0pre1
1.2.10 will NOT be released
- fixes text on Advanced screen buttons
- added button to Advanced screen 'Setup WIFI'
- 'Advanced', 'Memory', 'Battery' buttons are now configurable
(and include 'default', 'lock', 'poweroff',
'switch wifi', 'run arbitrary applicatoin' actoins).


Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

icons scaling, prefernces on-screen scroll buttons

Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Recover 1.3.0pre1
- strange behavior, not work on NOOK but work on emulator

Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

- buttons for scroll in preferences
- some preparation for icon scaling in view
(nook have some VERY big inconsistences in ListView and GridView
implementations against 'reference' design (i.e. emulator)), so all functions
about 'on-screen scroll' acquire soon ability to be disables via config
(and so enabled for more reference-like devices, i.e. - Sony).



Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.3.0pre2

- added ability configure icon size
- added on-screen scroll buttons for preferences
- added ability to disable (buggy) percentage scroll on Nook (on by default)
- added extended functionality to Last Used, Favorites and Settings buttons

Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.3.0pre3
- fixes on search
- fixes in results - directories no more 'filtrable' and always present
- fixes in preferences - no more user confirmation to change
settings without changes


Signed-off-by: Igor Dulevich <gamba69@gmail.com>

Version 1.3.0
- full source code cleanup and formatting
- misc. fixes
